title: Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 29 of 2022) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime 
and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) 
Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development maritime valuation (amendment) act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) order 2022

title: Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 29 of 2022) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 9th day of September 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of September 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Planning and Development, Maritime and 
Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 29 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 3 (other than sections 44, 45, 46, 54, 70, 71, 72, 73 and 75). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 September, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [447] 3
